rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south facade to maximize natural light and ventilation. Follows Vastu principles with an open space allowing positive energy flow.
Adjacent dining area integrated into the living room for seamless indoor-outdoor connectivity. Windows designed to overlook the garden space.
Modern kitchen with efficient workflow and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Vastu aligned with east exposure for auspicious energy.
Largest bedroom featuring north-east orientation to ensure a calm and restful ambiance according to Vastu. Includes walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom.
Secondary bedroom with south-west exposure ensuring privacy and ample natural light.
Full bathroom accessible to both bedrooms, designed with privacy in mind.
Small utility room for storage and maintenance equipment.

openings.description: Main entrance door with floor-to-ceiling glass panel to allow natural light and visual continuity.
Secondary exit leading directly to the swimming pool area, designed for easy access.
Floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the swimming pool area from the kitchen and living room.

rooms.description: Expansive rooftop terrace providing outdoor living space. Equipped with seating areas and privacy screens while offering views of the skyline. Designed to complement the Chettinad style and local Vastu principles.

openings.description: Staircase from the ground floor leading directly to the rooftop terrace for convenient access.

rooms.description: Dedicated deck area surrounding the swimming pool with built-in seating and ambient lighting. Designed in harmony with Chettinad style aesthetics.

openings.description: Entrance to the pool deck from the living area, ensuring ease of access and safety.
